overview: Mr. Parker Morse is currently employed at Blue Bite, LLC in the position of Chief Operating Officer. Parker is responsible for the day-to-day operations of Blue Bite. Prior to joining Blue Bite, he was part of the Corporate Business Development and Strategy team at Warner Bros Entertainment. His wealth of contacts and knowledge of the Alternative-Out-Of-Home market has been very instrumental to the Company. In addition, Parker was an investment banking analyst at GCA Savvian, where he focused on capital raising and M&A primarily in the digital media and Alternative-Out-of-Home advertising space. Parker received a B.A. in Economics from the University of Pennsylvania.
